MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH7 and CH8  postcode areas of Mold and Holywell, affecting properties in Hendre and Halkyn and surrounding areas. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:11 PM due to urgent repairs being needed on our overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5: 30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4: 35 PM on 16th April 2021.
